noDetails: Details about the project will be displayed here :)
friendlyPoker: Site for a legal poker club 'Friendly Poker Club.'
Features: tournaments schedule, loading data for multiple cities, city decoding by user's IP;
In future: gallery page and page with poker rules.
simples: Stack: Vue.js (VueRouter, a bit of Vuex), mathjs, api wiki;
Features: todo list; infinite scroll posts; wiki pages search; calculator.
chat: Features: hosted project is most luckily asleep due to inactivity (ws server is hosted on Render), so it takes a couple of minutes for it to come back up and work;
